meanings.definition: An extreme fear or aversion to animals.
meanings.sent1: Her zoophobia made it difficult for her to visit the zoo.
meanings.sent2: His zoophobia caused him to avoid petting zoos.
meanings.sent3: The zoophobia kicked in when she saw a tiny mouse.
meanings.sent4: His zoophobia was like a dark cloud following him wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The zoophobia felt like a heavy weight on her chest, suffocating her.

meanings.sent1: The child's zoophobia made him scream at the sight of a harmless puppy.
meanings.sent2: Her zoophobia led her to cross the street to avoid a stray cat.
meanings.sent3: His zoophobia acted up when he saw a squirrel holding a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The zoophobia in his mind turned every harmless creature into a monster.
meanings.sent5: The zoophobia gripped her heart like icy fingers, paralyzing her with fear.
